name: Bluemats Technology BV
goal:
Bluemats Technology BV offers solutions for the circular economy to clients in Europe:
- Technical solutions Water, Energy and Recycling
- Research solutions (chemical)
- Public affairs services
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation
